articles.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, February 26, 2026
articles.source: Institute for the Study of War
articles.snippet: Russia launched another massive missile and drone strike against Ukraine on the night of February 25 to 26, targeting energy infrastructure.

articles.title: Ukraine frontline update February 26 2026
articles.snippet: Frontline updates from Ukraine on February 26 show sustained hostilities across multiple sectors, with 57 enemy attacks this morning.
